strapiPost.title: Pop-Up Market Today Behind Momentary
strapiPost.content:
The NWA Girl Gang and Rejoicy are hosting a pop-up market today behind the Momentary from 6-10p. 

  • Shop local: The pop-up is free and open to the public! An inclusive market experience will provide a space for you to shop from a diverse array of brands, businesses, artists, and makers. All vendors are participating in the pop-up at no cost to them. 
  • Additions: Donations to support the NWA Girl Gang Market are greatly appreciated but not necessary for entry. In addition to vendors, the market will have a sensory tent sponsored by Ozark Luxury Camping to experience and on-site tattooing by Tailored Fit Tattoo with exclusive flash art.

Learn more HERE.
